page.title: 14Wylye Valley Conservation
page.content: Some farmers in our valley are concerned about wild life.They have planted woods, some soft wood and some hard wood.They have also planted tall crops as shelter for pheasants, but other birds and animals make use of them too.They dont remove any hedges or banks because they provide homes for wild life. Some farmers try to avoid the use of insecticides, realising the danger to wild creatures, but they use some herbicides to control weeds.They also use fertilizers such as phosphates, potash and nitrogen.
